oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Scottish Agricultural College: Craibstone experimental farm
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Pasture and forage crops
Dairy cattle
Sheep and goats
Beef cattle
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Organic since 1992. 89ha ploughed land, 60 ha permanent pasture. 350 breeding ewes and 100 finishing cattle. Greenhouse facilities for soil and plant science
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: {Facility} SAC: Scottish Agricultural College: Craibstone experimental farm. Facility Leader(s): Younie, David; Watson, Christine and Gray, Douglas, Scottish Agricultural College.
